game.name: Dark Village
game.description:
The biggest zombie attack has taken place today. Would you able to survive through the extremely challenging and horror environment? If you have enough craze to accept any tricky challenge, Dark Village is just for you. Oh no! This area is full of blood-thirsty demons, witches and werewolves and you are only hope of the people of the city. Grab your gun and get ready to clear them from the screen during each mission in this latest action game!
These monsters are very dangerous and know only to suck the blood of human beings. You do not need to go through the haunted place that you see on the screen. All you need to put your eyes on your screen and finger on your mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to shoot these deadly souls. Be careful since the scary monsters will keep coming to you in different waves! Shoot them before attack you in this HTML5 shooter challenge!
There are different and addictive missions to take care and the number of monsters will keep increasing as you move to the advanced level. Keep shooting until all the evil souls are killed in this cool shooting game! Try to complete your mission before you lose all of your health! Track your score by looking at the top left corner of the screen! This awesome horror game features several hours of gameplay, different backgrounds, scary sound, as well as different and complementary endings
